snippet.title: CLAW Arena Trailer 3
snippet.description:
CLAW Arena is an arena fighting game for mobile devices featuring unique one-finger controls. Introducing the new Claw Cancel mechanic -- cancel any special move to extend your combos. Also check out the new enemies and environments.

Select one of 8 animal warriors with distinct movesets and fight your way through the tournament to become the champion of the Combat League! Customize your warrior with unlockable outfits and upgradeable equipment to fit your playstyle. The simple controls are designed to be played with one hand, while offering lots of options to create advanced combos and counterplay.

Website: https://www.clawarena.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MochaChili
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MochaChiliGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mochachilig...

#ClawArena #MobileArenaFighter #AnimalWarriors
